name: Sidekick Steve
description:
You aren't the hero... you're the sidekick!

Help Sidekick Steve clean up the city after Captain Collateral came through and "saved the day." Sweep up debris, do tasks and try to get the fastest time!

Made for the Godot Wild Jam 33. Theme: You're not the hero.

Programming - Russell/Worldshatter

Art - Pippa/IHaveAnInkling
